Project Name: Minasian (Caro) Collection of Persian and Arabic Manuscripts
Title: Majmūʿah
Description.tableOfContents: Title: al-Shawāhid al-rubūbīyah; (1) Pp. 6-236.  The first 41 pages are damaged. There is a hole in the top half of the pages. A treatise on various aspects of theology and philosophy, including metaphysics, epistemology, etc. Includes notes in the margins.|~|Title: al-Mashāʿīr; (2) Pp. 238-281.  A well-known philosophical treatise on some metaphysical and theological issues. Includes notes in the margins.|~|Title: al-Wajīzah fī dirāyat al-ḥadīth; (3) Pp. 290-297.  Treatise on the transmission of ḥadīth, or ʿilm al-dirāyah. Includes notes in the margins.|~|Title: Ithbāt al-wājib; (4) Pp. 298-366.  Treatise on the proof of the existence of God and His attributes. Includes notes in the margins.|~|Title: Sirr al-qadar; (5) Pp. 367-373.  On fate and astrology.|~|Title: Risālah fī Miʿrāj khamsat ʾabdān; (6) Pp. 373-374.  A treatise on the five instances of miʿrāj, or heavenly ascent, in the Islamic tradition. Author is unknown.|~|Title: Risālah fī al-radd ʿalá man qāl inna al-insān yatalāshá wa yafná; 7. Pp. 374-377.   A treatise of Plotinus on the eternity of the soul.|~|Title: Min ifādāt al-Shaykh al-Bahāʾī; (8) Pp. 377-381. On ʿilm al-rijāl, or the verification of ḥadīth and ḥadīth narrarators.

Source: Caro Minasian Collection of Persian and Arabic Manuscripts, box 5, 31
Description.citation: Muḥammad Taqī Dānish-pazhūh, Fihrist-i Nushahhā-yi khaṭṭī, daftar 11 & 12 (Ṭihrān: Intishārāt-i Dānishgāh-i Ṭihrān, 1983), p. 658.

Project Name: Minasian (Caro) Collection of Persian and Arabic Manuscripts
Title: Majmūʿah
Description.tableOfContents: Title: Ḥilyat al-muftī; Pp. 2-82.  On the qualifications and manners of religious judges, quḍāt and fuqahā, according to Islamic dictates and jurisprudence. A commentary on al-Shāfiʿī's treatment of the subject.|~|Title: Risālah fī marātib al-wilāyah; P. 83 only.  Fragment, missing end folios. On the stations of mystics. Author is unknown.|~|Title: Ḥilyat al-ibdāl; Pp. 88-98.  Fragment, the end folios are missing. On the stations of mystics.  See Brockelmann, I (2nd ed), 575.|~|Title: Sharḥ bāl wa rashḥ ḥāl; Pp. 100-108.  Written by al-Ḥamāwī on mystics and mysticism and sent to Ibn al-ʿArabī for a response.|~|Title: Khuṭbah; Pp. 110-113.  On the attributes of God.|~|Title: Risālah fi-al-amr bil-maʿrūf wa-al-nahī ʿan al-munkar; Pp. 114-117.  Legal work on religious ethics. Author is unknown.|~|Title: Ḥāshiyah ʿalá al-Kashshāf lil-Zamakhsharī; Pp. 118-142.  A fragment of a commentary on the linguistic commentary on the Qur'an by al-Zamakhsharī.  Ending missing.

Project Name: Minasian (Caro) Collection of Persian and Arabic Manuscripts
Title: Majmūʿah
Description.tableOfContents: Title: Bīst bāb dar usturlāb; Pp. 2-38.  A treatise on using astrolabes in twenty chapters. Incomplete.|~|Title: Thawābit al-aflāk; Pp. 42-119.  A treatise on astronomy with diagrams and charts. Includes Persian marginal notes.|~|Title: Sharḥ al-Mulakhkhaṣ fī ʿilm al-hayʾah; Pp. 122-449.  A commentary written for the Timurid Shah Ulugh Beg by Qāḍī Zādah (d. ca. A.D. 1436) on al-Chaghmīnī's (d. A.D. 1344) treatise on astronomy al-Mulakhkhaṣ fī ʿilm al-hayʾah.

Project Name: Minasian (Caro) Collection of Persian and Arabic Manuscripts
Title: Majmūʿah
Description.tableOfContents: Title: Sharḥ ʿalā ʿAllāmah al-Ḥillī fī al-kalām; Pp. 4-44.  A work on kalām, missing the beginning. Begins with section two, which is a commentary on ʿAllāmah Ḥillī's positions on kalām. It is followed by section three, where the author discusses other matters regarding kalām, including aspects of Shīʿī doctrines. The text is the product of a muqabalah with a manuscript of the commentator dated A.H. 723. Author is unknown.|~|Title: Risālah fī al-balāghah; Pp. 46-63.  Fragment, missing beginning and ending. A manual on literary eloquence, including discussions on speech and grammar and a commentary on the famous grammarian al-Sībawayh. Author is unknown.|~|Title: Durrat al-ghawwāṣ fī awhām al-khawāṣṣ; Pp. 65-75.  This is a treeatise on the incorrect usage of Arabic expressions, using examples from stories about the early Shīʿī imams and leaders, including al-Ḥasan, al-Ṣādiq and Muḥammad ibn al-Ḥanafiyah. Missing end folios.|~|Title: Siyāq-i tārīkh-i Nīshāpūr; Pp. 77-80.  This is only a short fragment of the text.  After one page of text, poems from al-ʿAbd al-Qāhir al-Jurjānī and al-Maydānī.|~|Title: Al-Abānah fī sharḥ Kitāb al-sāmī fī al-asāmī; P. 81 only.  From a commentary on the book of Arabic linguistics al-Sāmī fī-al-asāmī. Author is unknown.|~|Title: Muntakhab min al-aḥādīth fī umūr mukhtalifah; Pp. 83-85.  Three pages on various ḥadīth and stories of the Shīʿī imams. Incomplete, missing ending. Author is unknown.|~|Title: Safaḥāt min aqsām al-ḥikmah; Fragment, missing beginning and ending. Pp. 86-87.  The first part deals with practical philosophy, a commentary on Aristotle's Book of Ethics, and al-Fārābī's the Virtuous City. Followed by a discussion of natural philosophy. Author is unknown.|~|Title: Ṣafaḥāt min al-adab al-ʿarabī; Pp. 88-90.  Fragment, missing beginning. Three pages on Arabic literature. The second page is damaged. Author is unknown.|~|Title: Risālah dar irth-i zan; Pp. 91-98.  Treatise in Persian on the legal inheritance rights of women.|~|Title: Jawāhir al-tafsīr; P. 99.  One page, missing beginning. Commentary on the Qurʾān. Author is unknown.|~|Title: al-Farāʾiḍ; Missing ending. On jurisprudence, dealing with inheritance. Author is unknown.|~|Title: Naqd al-uṣūl wa-talkḥīs al-fuṣūl; On logic. The second part is a commentary on Aristotle's Prior Analytic and Posterior Analytic. Author is unknown.|~|Title: al-Ishārāt wa-al-tanbīhāt; Begins with a discussion of physics and includes Arabic commentary in the margins. Missing ending.|~|Title: Anwār al-ḥikmah; Islamic religious tracts on the knowledge of God, Angels, prophets, and revealed books. Author is unknown.
Subject: Poets, Persian $v Biography|~|Poets, Arab $v Biography|~|Arabic poetry

Project Name: Minasian (Caro) Collection of Persian and Arabic Manuscripts
Title: Majmūʿah
Description.tableOfContents: Title: al-Farāʾiḍ al-nasīrīyah; On inheritance. Missing beginning folios and includes notes in the margins.|~|Title: Risālah fī innā min ay mawḍiʿ jiʾnā ilá hādhā al-ʿālim; On metaphysics. Deals with the purpose of existence and the transmigration of the soul after death.|~|Title: Faṣl al-maʿlūl ṣūrat al-ʿillah wa ẓāhirihā; A two page treatise on philosophy and mysticism. Covers knowledge of the self.|~|Title: al-Khuṭbah al-ghurrāʾ; A two page sermon praising God's creation and the teleological structure of the universe.|~|Title: Sharḥ al-Khuṭbah al-ghurrāʾ; A commentary on and translation of Ibn Sina's original sermon by ʿUmar Khayyām (1048-1131).|~|Title: Tafsīr Sūrat al-Ikhlāṣ; This is a philosophical interpretation on the Qurʾānic surah al-Ikhlās, with an emphasis on metaphysics and the unity of God. Includes notes in the margins. Attributed to Ibn Sīnā.|~|Title: Tafsīr Sūrat al-Falaq; This is a philosophical interpretation on the Qurʾānic surah, al-Falaq, with an emphasis on metaphysics. Attributed to Ibn Sīnā.|~|Title: Tafsīr Sūrat al-Nās; A philosophical interpretation of the Qurʾānic sūrah al-Nās with an emphasis on metaphysics. Attributed to Ibn Sīnā.|~|Title: al-Risālah al-khalʿīyah; A two-page tract on mysticism.|~|Title: Tafsīr Sūrat al-Ikhlāṣ; Qurʾānic exegesis including metaphysical discussions of the unity of God and the concept of prophecy.|~|Title: Tafsīr Sūrat al-Ikhlāṣ; This is a philosophical interpretation of the Qurʾānic surah, al-Ikhlāṣ, with an emphasis on metaphysics and the unity of God. Includes notes in the margins.|~|Title: Āghāz va anjām|~|Title: Man aẓhar sirr al-qadr; Treaty on fate and destiny, including a commentary on Plato's view on the transmigration of souls.|~|Title: Tafsīr Sūrat al-Kāfirūn; Contains twenty chapters of Qurʾānic exegesis. Includes notes in the margins.|~|Title: Risāʾil mutafarriqah; Various treatises by an unknown author.|~|Title: Min jāmiʿ al-shitāt; Covers aspects of Shīʿī belief, including the concept of divinity, with a Persian introduction. Ending incomplete. Author is unknown.|~|Title: Risālah fī shubhat Ibn Kammūnah; A two-page tract on philosophy and the problem of the necessary being. Author is unknown.|~|Title: Parākandah'hā|~|Title: Risalah fī waḥdat al-wujūd; A short treatise on the concept of the unity of being. Incomplete ending. Author is unknown.|~|Title: Raqm-i Shāh Ṣafī dar manʿ aI-sharāb; A one-page tract on the prohibition of alcohol by the Safavid Shah.|~|Title: Rawāyah ʿan Ibn Ṭāwūs; Moral stories about mystics, including a story about the caliph Hārūn al-Rashīd and al-bahlūl al-majnūn. End folios are missing.|~|Title: Mughāliṭāt min sharḥ al-Qisṭās; A short philosophical treatise on the fallacy of logic, as found in Ibn al-ʿAtāʾiq al-Ḥillī's work on logic, Sharḥ al-Qisṭās.|~|Title: untitled|~|Title: Risālah fī ādāb al-munāẓirah; Deals with the art of dialectics. Includes notes in the margins.|~|Title: Fāʾidah fī tafṣīl maʿná al-ḥadīth al-muʿtabir fī al-mushtaqqāt; On the art of literary eloquence and logic. Author is unknown.|~|Title: Tafsīr Āyat al-Nūr; A mystically oriented interpretation of the Qurʾānic verse "al-Nūr" by al-Ghazālī.|~|Title: Tafsīr Sūrat al-Ikhlāṣ; A half-page commentary on the Qurʾānic surah al-Ikhlās.|~|Title: Burhān tasāwī zāwāyā al-muthallith ʿan al-Fārābī; A one-page treatise on geometry transmitted by al-Sayyid al-Dāmad. Author is unknown.|~|Title: Fī nūn al-tadāwī; A mystical tract on elements of Arabic grammar.|~|Title: al-Jadhwāt; A philosophical treatise on the soul and being. Missing beginning and end folios. Includes notes in the margins. Author is unknown.|~|Title: al-Iʿtiqādāt; A treatise on philosophical issues such as the existence and knowledge of the self and free will and predestination. Author is unknown.|~|Title: Taḥqīq al-vujūd; A short treatise on the unity of being. Incomplete.|~|Title: Tafsīr-i Sūrat al-Ikhlās; A half-page Qurʾānic exegisis. Author is unknown.|~|Title: Shubhah Mashhūrah li-Ibn al-Kammūnah|~|Title: Sharḥ Aristūtālīs fī al-Saʿādah|~|Title: Masāʾil fī kutub al-fiqh|~|Title: Asrār al-tanzīl|~|Title: Sharḥ Ḥadīth ʿan ʿAlī|~|Title: Qāla al-ʿAllamah al-Ḥillī|~|Title: Aḥādīth mutafarriqah|~|Title: Fī ithbāt nubuwwat nabiyinā|~|Title: Fī khalq al-ʿālam
Name.repository: University of California, Los Angeles. $b Library Special Collections
Source: Caro Minasian Collection of Persian and Arabic Manuscripts, box 5, 35
Description.citation: Muḥammad Taqī Dānish-pazhūh, Fihrist-i Nushahhā-yi khaṭṭī, daftar 11 & 12 (Ṭihrān: Intishārāt-i Dānishgāh-i Ṭihrān, 1039 AH), p. 359.
Description.note: Some pages appear missing: Pages 126-127, 154-155, 202-207, 214-220, 344-345, 372-373, 394-397; Will need to verify against physical object.
